price: (20) And indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord, lest you stone me.[1462]
arabic: وَإِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۡ أَن تَرۡجُمُونِ
footnotes: [1462]- To death.  Or "lest you assault me [with your tongues or harm me otherwise]."

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-innī ʿudh'tu birabbī warabbikum an tarjumūni
